thread.title: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo Pushes Government Pay Raise in Budget Talks

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo Pushes Government Pay Raise in Budget Talks

organizations.name: pushes government pay raise in budget talks new york

text:
New York lawmakers on Wednesday continued haggling over the stateâ€™s $160 billion budget, with issues including a possible government pay raise added to the mix.
They are running up against an April 1 deadline, but Gov. Andrew Cuomo said lawmakers are expecting to leave Albany for religious holidays on Friday and he wants the budget passed by then.
